title: Feel
cleaned_text: Balance Women's Health is now a part of LIFESTANCE HEALTH! Patients will continue to receive the same comprehensive and compassionate care with the same insurance coverage. This site will soon redirect to a site our new online home where you'll find access to our online scheduling, expanded resources, and important information. [Please click here](https://balancewomenshealth.com/lifestance-health/)to learn more about this transition. LifeStance Health is committed to providing continuity of care in support of our clients' treatment plans and to also address additional fears, stresses and anxieties during the current health crisis. This is the place where you can... just be. Balance Women's Health Specializing in the Treatment of Women with Mood, Anxiety & Sexual Health Disorders in Oklahoma We want you to be heard, intimate, healthy, connected, energized, present, whole, and renewed. Be Balanced. Live your best life. We specialize in the diagnosis and treatment of mood, anxiety, and sexual health disorders commonly influenced by reproductive hormones, during and after pregnancy and through the midlife transition to menopause. We balance your mind, mood, and body.
